data.Name: DROELOE
data.Bio: Hailing from The Netherlands and branded with their signature skull, Dutch duo DROELOE have taken the 'future bass' scene by storm. What began with a SoundCloud account - where they uploaded their own music and curated their favorite releases in their "Pokoe Pack" mixes - soon developed a reputation for creating impeccable percussion-heavy future bass infused with the catchiest melodies. Comprised of producer Vincent Rooijers and visual designer Hein Hamers Read more on Last.fm
